response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which is tailored to meet your specific needs and valued at $12,000. Considering its high quality and the benefits it brings, I believe we can come to an agreement that respects both our interests. To make this opportunity more appealing, I am offering the product to you at a special introductory price of $11,000. This is a limited-time offer, so I encourage you to respond promptly. Looking forward to your positive response.", "product_price": 11000}
